short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TheHUB chrome extension is a application used by thehub app users a unified communication app!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Application used by thehub app users a unified communication app that allow them to make and recieve calls. This extension is used for following purposes.
1) To dial calls on their yealink voip phones through Local Area Network.
2) Copy a selected number and dial it through the HUB APP using context menu.
3) Show desktop notifications for incoming calls with action buttons (accept & decline)
